name: Disney•Pixar Monsters Inc. Scream Team Training
name_original: Disney•Pixar Monsters Inc. Scream Team Training
description:
Disney•Pixar Monsters Inc. Scream Team Training is an arcade game developed by Gorilla Systems. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Disney Interactive.
Disney•Pixar Monsters Inc. Scream Team Training is available on PC.
